message: Generated 19 quiz questions for Week 7 (Social Psychology) with comprehensive coverage of all required topics

topics_covered: Kelley's Covariation Theory (consensus, distinctiveness, consistency) - 5 questions
Attribution biases (FAE, Self-Serving, Actor-Observer, False Consensus) - 6 questions
Jones & Davis Correspondence Inference (intention, social desirability) - 2 questions
Conformity (Sherif autokinetic, Asch lines, informational vs normative influence, internalization vs compliance) - 4 questions
data.format_verified: All questions follow exact JSON format with question, difficulty, options, answer, and nested explanation structure
